text: Expect the best, Prepare for the worst.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

text: The union movement has been the best middle class job creating program that America has ever had, and it doesn't cost the government a dime.
author: Andy Stern

text: The best subjects are always people, who never fail to amaze me by their unpredictability.
author: Ronnie James Dio

text: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.
author: Kim Kardashian
